subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Taekwondo
Wrestling
Cycling, Road
lead_paragraph: Jordan Burroughs of the United States won a gold medal in wrestling; Steven Lopez fell in his opening taekwondo bout; the International Olympic Committee stripped the American cyclist Tyler Hamilton of his 2004 gold medal.
snippet: Jordan Burroughs of the United States won a gold medal in wrestling; Steven Lopez fell in his opening taekwondo bout; the International Olympic Committee stripped the American cyclist Tyler Hamilton of his 2004 gold medal.
